text: Strom Peterson is a member of the Washington State House of Representatives representing the 21st Legislative District.http://housedemocrats.wa.gov/legislators/Strom-Peterson/ ==City Council== Strom was appointed to the Edmonds City Council in 2009. He retained his seat in 2009 and was reelected to the Council in 2013.http://www.heraldnet.com/article/20130926/NEWS01/709269910 He served for two years as the Council's President. ==Election to the Washington State House of Representatives== Strom finished second in the August primary to Republican Allen McPheeters, defeating three other Democratic candidates.http://www.heraldnet.com/article/20140805/NEWS01/140809477 In the November election, Strom defeated McPheeters with over 60% of the vote http://results.vote.wa.gov/results/current/LegislativeDistrict21.html ==References== Category:Members of the Washington House of Representatives Category:Washington (state) Democrats Category:Living people Category:21st- century American politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Strom Peterson
